# V-CONCAT | Video Concatenation Tools

This project contains a tools for concatenating videos.
using FFmpeg as the core engine, focusing on how to saving more time while merging videos.

There are two versions: **LITE** and **ADVANCED**.  

## LITE
Main entry and only one entry point is `concat.cmd`
Work on windows with help from `ffmpeg`, `powershell`, `cmd`

## ADVANCED
Main entry and only one entry point is `vconcat.py`

## TODO
